title: Momentum SGD is very slow with large embedding layer
body_html: Hi, I have an (256 col* 500000row) embedding layer in my model and I found that Momentum SGD is 10x slower than adam optimizer. When I printed the global variables using API :tf.global_variables(), I found a large Momentum variable created by optimizer, does that means Momentum SGD have not supported sparse update yet?
body_text: Hi, I have an (256 col* 500000row) embedding layer in my model and I found that Momentum SGD is 10x slower than adam optimizer.
